Journal Story: Hi. We are Sarah and Jay Bigelow from Gardnerville Nevada. We will be celebrating our 30th anniversary during our 2017 Appalachian Trail thru hike. Please join us at https://sarahandjayappalachiantrailthruhike2017.blog/

Here are our daily mileages so far2/18/17 Amicalola Visitor Center to Mile 5.0 of approach; 5.0 miles.2/19/17 To just past Hightower Gap at AT mile 9.9; 12.9 miles.2/20/17 Almost to Dockery Lake Trail AT mile 23.0; 10.1 miles.2/21/17 Almost to Cowrock Mt. AT mile 35.6; 12.6 miles.2/22/17 Site of former Rocky Knob Shelter AT mile 49.2; 13.6 miles.2/23/17 Swag of the Blue Ridge AT mile 61.9; 12.3 miles.2/24/17 Dicks Creek Gap (Hostel) AT mile 69.3; 7.4 miles.
Setting out today from the Top of Georgia Hostel. We enjoyed our stay here. We plan to reach Nantahalla Outdoor Center in 6 days.
